scripts.test: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(yarn bin):$PATH && cd - && jest
scripts.build: node scripts/buildReactIcons.js && cd ../.. && export PATH=$(yarn bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --source-maps -d lib src && flow-copy-source -v src lib
scripts.watch: node scripts/buildReactIcons.js && cd ../.. && export PATH=$(yarn bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --watch --source-maps -d lib src & flow-copy-source -w -v src lib
